name: Viade
description: Viade is a Solid project developed by third year students of the University of Oviedo Software Engineering degree in the Software Architecture subject. It offers a route sharing application following the SOLID principles. This is a site where all your data always remains yours.

images.text: Complete it with images and videos
Share it with whoever you want

images.alt: Keep the ownership of your data
images.text: And keep the ownership of your data
